website_summaries.verdict: Adorable character boots of high EMU quality. Choose between several cute styles, including koala and ladybug.
pros: Made just like other popular EMUs with warm, comfortable  sheepskin material
Numerous sizes for toddlers and kids
cons: Girls may prefer some of the character designs more than boys do, though the boots are suitable for both genders

customer_reviews.title: emu's - like Uggs - are made in Australia
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT real EMU boots! filling started falling apart and could see in sunlight it is shiny which means it's acrylic. This also explains why my son's feet kept getting so hot. My son has sensory issues and had extremely tough time with these FAKE boots. PS - These are made in china. emu's - like Uggs - are made in Australia. Very unhappy customer and sending these back.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Imbriaco

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and arrived fast. My daughter gets so many compliments on her boots and she loves them too which is the most important thing!
customer_reviews.author: NVO

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger kids that don't wear out the shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for younger kids that don't wear out the shoes as fast. Cute and lasts long. Easy to clean. Wouldn't recommend for older kids who are harder on shoes. If you kids are hard on shoes they are not great.
customer_reviews.author: P. Martin

customer_reviews.title: The warmest, cutest boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved these! They held up very well to TONS of abuse. The colors are subdues and not tacky and loud. It's a pretty brick red. The warm is soft and very warm, extremely warm. The soles never came apart from the actual boot. I would LOVE to buy these again if they ever go on sale. I bought three different styles for $75, back in 2010! I guess never again, huh?
customer_reviews.author: patchouliii

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and perfect for my 5 yr old boy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and perfect for my 5 yr old boy. He would wear them everyday, everywhere if we let him.he complained about his feet the first day but hasn’t said anything since.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of cuteness

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter last year and she loved them. The only problem I had was sizing. She was only 1 1/2 with tiny feet. She wore them in spite of it and now this year they fit her and they are her favorite boots. She was at Whistler last weekend, the snow was powder so they worked great. They were the only pair she would wear - she just loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Book Junkie

customer_reviews.title: CUTE
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of EMU. Everything (size, materials) are perfect as my expected. My daughter very love it.
customer_reviews.author: MadAmHui

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5-year-old niece. She will love how cute they are, and her mom and dad will love how warm her feet stay. In addition, they should stay fresh looking, as they are dark enough to hide dirt and scuff.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Sized up one size for easy on / off
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3yr old nephew loves these boots! Comfy and cozy. Sized up one size for easy on / off. Love this brand for good quality and cute designs!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but do run small
customer_reviews.text: Loved how water proof these boots really are! Though they do for small; I bought a toddler 8 even though my son was between a 6 or 7 in regular shoes. He barely made it through the winter before he outgrew them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love emu boots. I get them every season and they never disappoint. this one fits true to size but i think it does stretch a little with wear
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old granddaughter had to have lady bug boots, and these are terrific. Warm, cute and good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old son and he loves it. I got this on sale and it was totally worth it. Thank you for the holiday deals Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Bimmer5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these!! My daughter receives so many compliments when she wears these boots and finds them incredibly "cozy".
customer_reviews.author: AnnMilton

customer_reviews.title: Adorable boots ❤
customer_reviews.text: I just got my son's shark boots today absolutely love them , they are not cheap looking or knockoff material at all , good quality ..... I'm 100% a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Rose Serna

customer_reviews.title: Careful with size
customer_reviews.text: Very sadly I needed to return this cute shoes as it was too small for my girl and larger size was not available for purchase. Winter shoes must be typically bought larger due to a sock. But this shoes is like a slipper so I thought sizing up was not necessary. As a result, arrived shoes happened to be too small. Otherwise I think that the products is wonderful. Cute and funny. Buy the size as you buy normal winter (larger) shoes and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: ASK

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes !! Incredible Price
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter when they were having a huge sale... She loves them & wears them everyday... Great Quality, Warm & Adorable
customer_reviews.author: Kozzie

customer_reviews.title: On our 3rd pair.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are adorable and my daughter loves them, so much we keep buying new ones when she outgrows them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves how warm and comfy these boots feel. We have gotten so many compliments :-). We love how cute the lady bug look compliments her skirts and dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boot for my daughter and she loves it very much. The color and the design is very lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Willa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are adorable and my daughter says they r super cozy
customer_reviews.author: Denise Gregorio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Its cuter in reality.Looks adorable on those tiny feet!
customer_reviews.author: aphrodite

customer_reviews.title: we love them, just perfect
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!!! so cute, we love them, just perfect. Greatly made and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grey Boots
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Very cute, warm, and comfortable. They are exactly as pictured and my daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Georgina

product_meta.title: EMU Australia Toddler/Little Kid Little Creatures Character Boot
product_meta.description:
Wool mark certified, Australian Marino Wool boot

No matter the weather, this playful boot from EMU Australia is sure to put a smile on your little one's face. This pull-on style is crafted in suede for a flexible, supportive fit and has the coziest lining imaginable, which keeps busy feet warm while wicking away moisture for even more comfortable fun. What's more, a logo-imprinted outsole grips for a steady step.

Emu Australia is an authentic Australian footwear company that uses only premium Australian sheepskin and Merino wool, along with the best footwear technologies available, to product a quality line of boots and slippers. Due to the unique properties of Merino wool your feet will stay warm in the winter and cool in the summer.

See more
feature_bullets: EMU Australia's Owl is a fun and colourful kid's boot made from premium quality suede and lined with 100% Australian Merino wool lining to keep little feet warm and cosy.
Upper - Cow Suede Lining - Deluxe Wool Sole - Eva / Tpr Insole/Trims - Deluxe Wool
100% Australian Merino wool lining and footbed
